name: 0x01_black_pixel.lf (adhd edition)
description: A single black pixel, written in LOGO (1967) and drawn with IBM LOGO (1983) on an IBM PC XT (5160) with 256Kb RAM and a CGA display. Inspired by 0x01.logo which is part of my xterm-16color collection on OpenSea. This is the “ADHD” edition, which is the 2 minute original runtime compressed into a byte sized 10 second clip.
